item.title: #14 - Journalism
item.description: The Question: How do you contribute towards society? The Topic: The call of the journalist. The Viewermail: Dealing with awful acnee.

item.title: #14 - Journalism
item.description: the_question How do you contribute towards society? Do you volunteer at the home shelter? Offering sexual favors to the homeless? Maybe you don’t do anything at all. I pay taxes and I help companies grow and I guess that’s how I quantify my contribution towards society. I also rape and murder. It’s good to give the police a reason to exist, AMIRITE!?!? the_topic Journalism I’m a Journalism graduate from Monash uninversity.
